channel.title: Adding teleports in and an ::item command
channel.description:
Recently, I have tried to add both an ::item command and add teleports back into my server. The source didn't have either and I was wondering if you could help me out. I know there's more to just adding an item command than just adding the easy step in [if(command...etc...]Since you made WhiteScape I was wondering, how do you get teleports to work fully? What do you have to add in? Also the same for the ::item command. If you could help me out, I'd appreciate it.
Thanks

item.title: Adding teleports in and an ::item command
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

[quote=“d shadow7 0, post:2, topic:92102”]the only thing i can say is get a new source if its gonna b a big deal[/quote]Why? If you can’t help, don’t spam here. My server has all these features and I added like half of them

* KBD lair.
* Training Island.
* Slayer house.
* Kalphite Lair with working KQ.
* Barrows Minigame.
* Fully working Castle Wars-I Loot I-
* Good weapon timers.
* Not able to mass when PKing
* Full character face!
* Private chat saves if you put on split private chat.
* Real special bar for whip.
* Barrows mini-game.
* Disabled teleports.
* Server won't lag, unless many people are on (I mean many Big Grin).
* Range and mage are very hard to get.
* Training isn't fast.
* 126 max combat level.
* Herblore works.
* Cooking works.
* Runecrafting works.  (Adding rocks to mine to get ess to craft runes.)
* Farming works.
* Fishing works.
* Kalphite and KBD lairs.
* Fletching works.
* Server will NEVER crash due to frugoo scape's tut Smiley
* Global objects with NO lag!
* Working Dueling!
* Customized training room.
* Smith your items!  (75% done)
* 99 max stat.
* Auto-restarter
* Dragon, rare, treasure trail, gilded, and barrows smithing!
* Full working Auto-cast (maybe?).

Read full topic
item.source: Adding teleports in and an ::item command
